name: hydro
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
short for hydroelectricity: electricity produced by the force of fast moving water such as rivers or waterfalls: Biofuels and wind power are promising technologies, along with small scale hydro and tidal power.
Canadian English electricity supplied as a service to the public: Last year we cut our use of hydro and gas by 22%. Your hydro bill will not be affected in any way.
More examplesFewer examplesNuclear power output actually fell last year and hydro output was static.We prefer clean, renewable energy alternatives, like hydro, geothermal, and wind projects.The hydro company refused to come and reattach the service.The man was electrocuted when he jumped onto live hydro wires.

(WATER)
